comm: nice and full to start, not much swing. 134 kph. Finch leaves this be
full again on off, Finch lunges forward to defend but gets a thick inside edge past square leg for a couple
poor delivery. Short and wide, Finch laces a cut to point. Jadeja does well to get a hand on it.
oh my. That is some intent. Very full on off, Finch lunges forward, gets to the pitch and neatly lofts the ball over mid-off for a boundary on the bounce. Seems Australia aren't too happy with 300
better from Ishant. Drags his length back just enough, good length outside off and left alone

given! What a delivery that is. Ducks back in prodigiously to hit Finch outside the line of off stump. But he wasn't offering a stroke. Umpire Kettleborough had no hesitation and raised his finger immediately but did that nip back in enough? Lots of swing for Ishant, the first time we have seen as much in this series.
ooh, stops in the wicket this time. Good length outside off, Warner shaped to cut through covers but the ball is awkwardly mis-timed to mid-off for a couple
length delivery on off, defended
defended off the back foot
this one swerves away from Warner this time. Fullish length outside off, the ball deviates past the flashing wide bat of David Warner
this is in the slot for Warner. A tad overpitched and Warner drives delectably into the gap through cover for a boundary. Made it look easy. Got close enough to the pitch too
back of a length on off, Warner goes back to defend
back of a length outside off, 137 kph. Smith shuffles across to leave
beautiful stride to the pitch and an elegant drive past cover to mid-off where Kohli does well, diving and stopping.
ducks back in from outside off, similar to the Finch wicket but not as much. Smith lets it go
comes back in late yet again. Back of a length on middle and Smith tucks this fine to fine leg for a run
good length on leg, clipped to square leg
good length down leg, off the thigh pad towards fine leg
not a good delivery from Yadav. Overpitched outside off at 137 ks. Warner leans into a drive to caress into the gap at covers for some runs

ooh, almost inside-edges onto his stumps. A hint of away shape outside off, Smith goes for another drive with his feet not quite close enough to the pitch, the ball hits the pad and then just evades off stump.
drifts down leg, wide
fullish on off, pushed to mid-on
140 ks. nice run that. Goes back to a good length delivery and plays a mis-timed punch to extra cover for a quick single
slower ball, 114 kph. Fullish outside off, very wide in fact. Warner reaches for it to flash to extra cover
superb shot. Drops just a tad short on off and Warner picks up the length so early, and then just picks it off his hips to the square leg boundary. Warner looking in ominous touch
139 kph, Back of a length outside off. Smith opens the face slightly but outside-edges to third man
another good single. Pushes a length delivery with soft hands towards mid-on and calls for the run
137 kph. Too wide outside off, lots of width but with Smith shuffling across to off, it seems like a ball closer to him and not wide enough to cut. Left alone
136 kph, what a shot that is. Gets on his toes, high enough and punches off the back foot through extra cover. Hit on the up
too straight and Warner nurdles it fine to fine leg, scampers back for the second. Excellent running
140 kph. Fuller length on off, defended into the off side
141 kph. Full again on off, driven to mid-on. Generating decent pace is Yadav
no, I'd rather not bowl there. Overly full on middle, worked to wide mid-on. Got away with that I reckon
that is better from Yadav. Top-of-off stuff, Warner quells to midwicket
good length outside off, pushed towards cover
too straight now. Good length down leg, pings off the thigh pad towards square leg
too full on off, Warner presents the full face of the bat to drive to mid-off
that is a good line to Smith. Back of a length and slightly wide of off, Smith shuffles across to leave
not to the pitch but he goes for the drive again,a  thick inside edge is got due to a bit of inward movement. Midwicket cleans up.
pushed off the back foot to cover
poor delivery. Very poor. Short and wide outside off, would have been called a wide if SMith left. He went after it though and pierced the gap to perfection. Past backward point
nice comeback. Back of a length outside off, nips back in. Left
136 kph, indications of a slightly two-paced wicket. The ball bounces a touch but comes on slower and Smith can only chop his attempted cut into the pitch
full on off to start, Warner pushes to mid-on for a run
138 kph. Decent pace. Short and wide outside off, Smith flashes a cut but misses
nice lines. 140 kph on off or just outside. Steered to point
length outside off, Smith strides forward to defend
back of a length on middle, worked off his hips towards midwicket. Smith races back for two. Great running
short and wide, a bit of extra bounce but a lot of width too. SMith is deceives by the bounce as the ball goes past the cut
fuller length down leg, whipped down to fine leg
beautiful lines. Full but wide outside off. For Smith, it seems closer to a typical delivery on off. Smith pushes to mid-off
rather full outside off, just the change in length. Smith drives past mid-on for four. Lovely on drive
forcing Yadav to him. Full delivery on off, a thick inside edge to fine leg for a couple
139 kph. Lovely batting. But that is a discernibly poor delivery from Yadav. Excessively full on middle and leg, Smith sees it early and clips the lofted flick over midwicket for four. Easy
driven awkwardly to cover
back of a length on middle, Warner misses his tuck and is struck on the thigh pad. Smith calls his partner through
slower delivery outside off, played down to point
fullish length outside off, Smith punches a square drive to point with minimal feet movement
doesn't time his pull very well but he picked the stroke nicely. Too short outside off, Smith clatters the pull over midwicket. Lobs over the infield for three

not there for the shot at all but Warner in imperious form. Slower ball outside off, Warner stays in his crease to pull past square leg, picked the shorter boundary and smashed it. Runs coming too easily
much much better. Full on off, hustling Warner for pace who defends late
too straight and Smith picks off his hips towards square leg
119 kph. Full on middle, tucked to midwicket
fullish length on off, clipped to midwicket again
an ugly hoick. Deceived by the lack of pace, slower ball on middle. Warner hits to mid-on
back of a length on middle, Warner goes for the pull but the ball goes through to hit him on the midriff. A very optimistic appeal from Dhawan is quickly withdrawn
outside-edged to third man

140 kph. Opportunity with a direct hit. Full and wide outside off, toe-ended to mid-off for a quick run. No hesitation at all in the run and therefore he would have made it easy with the full-length dive
full on off, defended under his eyes
back of a length on off, tucked to midwicket
nice lines these. Honing in on off, Smith blocks

very poor shot. Bumrah gets his first wicket. Smith picks out midwicket. Short delivery on off, Smith plays a nothing pull straight o short midwicket. Bumrah is jubilant. Big big wicket for India, this could put Australia behind the 8-ball for a while.
nice ball again. Attacking those stumps on a fuller length, Bailey pushes back to the bowler
length delivery on off, Warner closes the bat face to find the gap through midwicket
slower delivery down leg, wide
125 kph. Half-volley outside off, driven to extra cover
worked off his pads into the gap at backward square leg. Bailey comes back for the second
119 kph. Tight lines on off, defended
dabbed to third man with the open face
ducks back in very late, his trademark delivery. Short of a length but nips back to sneak betwen bat and pad. Just misses that off stump
full on off, pushed to the bowler
tucked to point for a quick run. Nice stuff from Bailey
back of a length, down leg. Off the thigh pad to fine leg
lovely delivery again. Change in length, goes for the shorter delivery. Bailey is hustled for pace as he tries to pull, the ball just misses that glove
another two. Inside-edged into the deeper leg side. Ishant at square leg runs in and throws but cannot prevent the second.
nice stroke. Dhawan errs too full and Warner calmly just lofts it over mid-off with the full face of the bat. Executed with enviable ease
back of a length outside off, punched to Jadeja at point for a quick run
126 kph, patted down to point
short and wide, Bailey flays a cut to extra cover

taken. Another wicket. Another big wicket. Legcutter on middle, taking the pace off the delivery and Bailey looks to turn to the leg side. The ball stops in the wicket and aids in taking the leading edge. Ishant at mid-on runs around and takes a dolly.
lovely delivery to greet Marsh. Full and straight, testing Marsh's reflexes. Easily pushed to mid-on though
that keeps very low and rolls away for four byes. Full outside off, Warner can't get baton it, the ball goes through Dhoni's legs as well to the boundary
nice lines - full on off, Steered to point
shortish delivery outside off, Warner cuts to deep cover
back of a length outside off, moving away from Marsh. Left
straying on his pads and Marsh picks the bowler off for a couple through square leg
134 kph. Nice end. Full outside off, Marsh leaves
too full, too wide. Warner drives past cover for one
back of a length outside off, a bit of spongy bounce. Marsh gets on top of the ball but mis-times the drive to mid-off
good length outside off, cut away to point
steered past point this time for one
lovely shot that. Driven past cover, Warner wants two immediately and makes it easy
smashed away on the bounce to deep midwicket. A nice pick-up shot
nice start. Full on off, no room. Warner can only drive to cover
full outside off, driven to mid-off with a turn of the bat face. A fumble from Kohli but no damage done
full on middle, worked towards midwicket
137 kph, full on middle. Extremely tight stuff this. Defended. India winning this period
wonderful stuff. Good length but just wide of off stump. Marsh chooses to let it go
slightly too straight and Marsh finds the gap through midwicket for two
too much width on that occasion and Warner flays a cut past point for a couple. Splendid fielding from Dhawan on the point boundary, that was scooting across hurriedly across the turf.
really good batting from Warner. Dhawan goes full now outside off, overpitched. Warner clears one foot and thrashes it over cover for six. That is imperious. Lovely to watch
shortish and wide, Warner drags it from well outside to square leg
123 kph, clipped off his pads to square leg
uppish but just wide of point. Slower delivery outside off, Warner cuts but can't keep it down. Deep point fields
120 kph, full and very wide. Called
full outside off, pushed to cover. 12 of the over
back of a length on middle, clipped nicely to deep midwicket. Good fielding as well prevents the second
nudged off his hips to fine leg
Ishant oversteps. Full and wide, Warner finds point with a cut
superb yorker from Ishant. Speared in the blockhole on off, Warner can only jam it out
full on off, pushed out to mid-off
back of a length on leg, Warner plays it to fine leg to bring up his fifty. Excellent innings this has been. A run-a-ball fifty
hit in the air to mid-on. A loose shot, but good fielding from mid-on to prevent it from going through. Landed just in front

just over long-on. Gurkeerat there but he wasn't on the boundary. Flighted delivery on middle, Warner heaves the swipe over long-on. The ball lands inside the boundary. Could have been an opportunity if he was on the boundary
worked to square leg for a quick couple. Played that well. Soft hands
92 kph, flat outside off, Warner punches to midwicket off the back foot
driven back to the bowler
flat and straight on middle, pushed back
flat on leg, Warner turns this with the spin to square leg
tossed up outside off, Warner gets down early and misses his slog sweep.

Marsh may be gone. This will be a huge wicket. marsh is gone. What a fortunate dismissal that is for India. Short outside off, Warner crashes a cut to deep point. And calls Marsh through. The throw is not very good, bounces just in front of Gurkeerat. The ball hits the knee of Gurkeerat and then ricochets onto the stumps to find Marsh short. Could be a massive moment in this game
short outside off, smashed to cover who fields well
short and wide, hit to cover.
tossed up outside off, driven to long-off. Warner key
tossed up outside off, Marsh squeezes the drive to an interestingly-placed short mid-off. Kohli runs around and throws it to the non-striker  but Marsh makes the run
tossed up outside off, Marsh goes for the hard sweep. Beaten
floated up on off, driven to cover
nice bowling. Tossed up on off, Marsh comes down to clip but inside-edges onto his pad
driven to Pandey at cover who stops at least a run, fantastic fielding
another thigh delivery. Marsh can't get it off the square
worked off his pads to deep midwicket. Great over, just one off it
tossed up on middle, Marsh comes down to flick to midwicket
short and wide outside off, Warner drags it to long-on
very dangerous shot. Yorker on middle, Marsh gets down early to sweep very hard between the gap at backward square leg
driven to long-off
huge six. Warner continues to counterattack. Flat on off, Warner gets down on one knee to swipe the slog sweep very high over the midwicket boundary. Big six, way back
driven to long-on
flat on leg, tucked to deep midwicket
fine paddle. Flat outside off, Marsh gets down early to play that stroke
Warner backs away and flays a cut to cover. Misfield by Gurkeerat who allows the extra runs
turned to deep midwicket for one
floated up on off, driven to cover
flat on middle, drilled to long-on
starts the spell with a full ball slanted down leg. Misses the flick and Dhoni can't collect, the ball deflects away into the fine leg region
very full on off stump, almost in the blockhole, driven to mid-off
full, once again drifting into the pads, poor ball with fine leg in the circle, but Marsh picks out the fielder with his flick
slower ball on middle stump, checks his drive to chip down the ground to long-on
full outside off, swiped with a lot of bottom hand to long-on
back of a length slower ball on middle stump, punched to straight midwicket
another slower one, full on off and middle, driven to long-on
back of a length on off stump, goes back to punch to sweeper cover
sees Warner stepping out and fires it into his pads. Warner clips it quietly to square leg
fullish, goes with the arm towards off stump. Looks for the cover drive but can only hit it back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, punched to sweeper cover
quickish length ball on off stump, defended to short midwicket
quickish again, a little shorter. Warner goes back and across to work to deep square leg

slower ball, but it's short, and there's plenty of width. Warner was initially looking to make room, but he had enough time to take a big step across with his back foot and chop it away to the right of backward point
short and wide again, slapped to sweeper cover
slower ball, fuller now and outside off, Warner jabs it down to long-off
back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on for the push to sweeper cover
full and wide, slapped to the left of sweeper cover
back of a length, angling into the batsman and cramping him for room, Marsh tucks it to midwicket
back of a length, a bit of turn in to cramp Warner's cut. Slaps it to short cover
a bit fuller and straighter. Warner shuffles across to tuck it through square leg
length ball on off stump, stays back and punches to short extra cover
a little more width, slapped to sweeper cover
stays back to a full ball on off stump, defends hurriedly to short cover
sees him coming down the track and fires it at his pads. Warner flicks towards short fine leg
ooh, and he produces an edge first up. Slants across Warner from a lovely length, opens him up, and he jabs at it and nicks through the vacant slip region
shortish on off stump, jumps across and works it to long leg
fullish outside off, and Marsh flows forward and drives, finishes with a high left elbow as the ball races away to the left of mid-off
short, wide, no one back on the square boundary and Marsh gets on top of the bounce and cuts it away to the point boundary with his weight on the front foot
back of a length, a bit closer to off stump, defended to backward point
not quite short enough to pull, drags it from off stump towards long leg
back of a length on off stump, goes back and cuts to the left of sweeper cover
full on off stump, presses forward and pushes to the left of short cover, and the fielder moves quickly to deny him the single
length ball on middle stump, Marsh uses his wrists to whip that towards long-on
flat, angling into middle stump, clipped to the left of short midwicket, where Pandey dives to make the stop
a touch shorter and he can work it wider of the midwicket fielder to pick up one
full on the pads, flicked away through square leg
length ball on off stump, comes forward for the checked drive through the covers
short ball on off stump, Warner plays that trademark checked pull of his, and Rohit has to put in a lot of work, sprinting to his right from long leg and diving to stop it at the rope
oh my. Another long-hop from Umesh, angling into the batsman, and he pulls that with utter contempt, launches it over the backward square leg boundary
slower ball wide of off stump, that is just too much width. Marsh sets himself up on the front foot, gets into a strong, stable position and rolls his wrists over to thrash that to the point boundary
short again, this one gets up to chest height, Marsh stands tall and pulls to deep square leg
back of a length on off stump, punched to deep point
flat and full on middle and leg. Warner goes back and across to work it into the leg side and Pandey dives to his left to stop it at midwicket
full on off stump, and now Jadeja cuts it off by moving quickly to his left. Warner was looking for the driven single to long-on
full on off and middle, clipped to midwicket
once again it's quick and full on off stump and once again Pandey moves quickly to his left at midwicket to rule out the single
a bit slower, and the line is a bit closer to the pads. Warner can work it squarer this time to pick up a single to the deep square leg fielder
back of a length on off stump, punched to short cover
length ball on off stump, punched down the ground and Ishant moves to his left from mid-off to stop it
length ball on off and middle and Marsh is a little late on his defensive push. The ball ricochets off the inside edge through square leg
fullish on off and middle, punched to midwicket
back of a length on off stump, goes back and tucks it to midwicket
back of a length close to off stump, punched back to the bowler
a touch shorter, hurries on as Warner looks to pull from outside off, can only hit it to mid-on
tossed up on middle stump, chipped cleverly over the bowler's head to pick up two. Long-on has quite a bit of distance to cover to his left
looks to sweep but it slides on and hits his back thigh. Appeal for lbw but it was missing leg stump
full on off and middle, clipped to long-on
fullish outside off, flat-batted towards sweeper cover
shortish, turns down leg, Warner pulls to deep square leg
fullish on middle stump, blocked towards short extra cover
slower ball outside off, can't time his drive and short cover moves in quickly to stop it
back of a length outside off. Another slower one and it doesn't come on for the cut. Slaps to that man Pandey at short cover

back of a length close to off stump. Warner lets it come on and chops it crisply to the left of third man. Takes the first run quickly, and he completes the second comfortably enough to break into his usual leaping century celebration. This has been another excellent innings. He's paced it so well and Australia are in a very good position despite those wickets lost
fuller and straighter now, driven back down the ground and it deflects off the stumps towards mid-on
back of a length, angling into off stump. Marsh is cramped for room a little, ends up jabbing it towards mid-off
bouncer, Marsh keeps the hook down well, took it from around head height and played it down towards deep backward square leg
length ball on off stump and that is a spectacular shot. Makes a bit of room and uses his wrists to take it on top of the bounce and flay it away between mid-off and extra cover
back of a length on off stump, no width for the cut and he chops it down a short distance from him, into the off side
length ball outside off, driven on the up to the left of the diving Pandey at short cover
fullish outside off and Warner shuffes across to clip it elegantly to the left of long-on
length ball on off stump and Warner dismisses it. Clears his front leg and swings through the line, back over the bowler's head and clears the straight boundary as well
back of a length on middle stump. Makes a bit of room and punches to short cover
length ball on off stump, gets forward for the checked push down the ground to the right of mid-off, and brings up his half-century
Warner comes down the track, making a bit of room, and Bumrah goes full and wide. Warner jams down on the ball and squeezes it out towards third man

whoa. That was a high full-toss, probably not over waist high, but it caught Warner off-guard, and he lost balance as he looked to swat it away into the leg side, and lost his grip on his bat handle too. Warner falls to the floor, bat goes flying away into the slip region
slower ball on middle stump, clipped down the ground, looking for two, but long-on rushes in quickly to keep them down to one
back of a length, angling into middle and leg. Was the slower one again, and Marsh closed his bat face too soon, looking to work it into the leg side. Leading edge pops up into the short cover region
low full-toss on off stump, jabbed to mid-off
sees him make room and follows with the blockhole ball outside leg. Squeezed away towards short cover
back of a length on middle stump, looked like the slower one. Too early into the pull and it hit him on the right side and rolled away into the backward point region
down the track and the attempted yorker becomes a full-toss on off stump. Makes a bit of room as he advances, and slaps it to the left and just out of reach of the diving Pandey at short cover
low full-toss on middle stump, jabbed to mid-off

gone! That was the slower ball, back of a length on off stump, and Warner backs away to manufacture room to cut. No pace on it, and the sliced uppercut drops towards backward point, where Jadeja takes a simple catch while falling to his right
back of a length on off stump, goes back and across and blocks right under his eyes
length ball angling into middle stump. Marsh gets his front pad out of the way and chips it back over the bowler's head
length ball on off stump, and Marsh clears his front leg to make a bit more swinging room, and brings down a perfectly straight bat to drive on the up between bowler and mid-off
slower ball on middle stump, gets forward and lets it come on to clip to long-on
back of a length on off stump, punched to deep point
long-hop, and this is just terrible bowling. Fine leg was in the circle, and deep square leg was in front of square, and he just has to swivel and put it away to the deep backward square leg boundary
slower ball, full on leg stump, clipped to long-on
back of a length close to off stump, not short enough for Wade to punch and it hurries past his outside edge
premeditates the sweep and Jadeja fires a full one past him, turns down the leg side
back of a length outside off, stabbed away towards deep point
full on leg stump, jabbed back to the bowler
back of a length, gives him a bit of width, and Marsh puts it away, cuts it clinically to the right of backward point
length ball outside off, a bit slower, and he's a bit early into the drive, slices it towards short third man
full outside off, driven to short cover
sees him moving across his crease and slants one full, down the leg side. Marsh misses the flick
length ball on off stump, punched to sweeper cover
full and wide, looking for the wide yorker. Opens his bat face, looking to steer it to the right of backward point, and Umesh dives to his right and makes a good stop
slower ball on off stump, whipped towards long-on
good slower ball, slanting away from off stump on a fullish length. Beats the attempted drive and rolls down to Dhoni
length ball wide of off stump. Wade reaches for it and gets a thick outside edge that runs away to the third man boundary
slower ball on off stump, clipped back to the bowler
fullish on off stump, swept to deep square leg
flat, quick, beats the attempted flick and turns down leg. Spotted Wade looking to walk across his stumps
full on off stump, Wade plays the checked drive to long-off
down the track and he bowls it full and angling into his feet. Marsh gets his front leg out of the way and drives to long-off
sets himself up early for the sweep and laps the flighted ball outside off towards deep square leg
down the track and Jadeja fires it in quicker, at his feet. Driven to long-on
full-toss wide of off, slower ball, reaches out and drags it to the left of sweeper cover
slower bouncer outside off. Marsh waits a long time and plays a tennis smash out to deep midwicket
slower ball, short outside off. Plenty of swinging room and Wade muscles it to the midwicket boundary
walks across his stumps and Rishi looks to follow him. Gets down low to lap the low full-toss over short fine leg
full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
full-toss wide of off stump, reaches out and pokes it away towards deep point. Was in the air for a while, and Umesh flew to his left from backward point, but that was just beyond his reach
full outside off, flat-batted to long-off
back of a length slower ball angling away from Wade, who whips it from outside off towards square leg
short, angling into off stump, and Marsh absolutely loves it there. Plants his front foot forward and pulls fiercely over the midwicket boundary
near-yorker on off stump, clipped towards long-on
yorker on leg stump and Wade has to pull his feet out of the way in a hurry to stab it into the on side
sees him coming down the pitch and follows with a full ball at his feet. Jams down and can't get bat to it, but it hits his foot and rolls away to the right of the keeper
slower ball wide of off. Wade waits and flat-bats to long-off
comes down the track and Rishi fires it at his feet. Clipped to deep midwicket
slower ball, full and wide, slapped away to the left of sweeper cover
wide yorker, reaches out and jabs to extra cover
slower ball, back of a length close to off stump. Marsh made a bit of room and then stayed nice and still to slap that to the cover boundary
full on middle stump, whipped to long-on
full and wide, stabbed to deep point
slower ball on leg stump and he clears his front leg to pull towards deep square leg
full-toss outside off and that is powerful. Strong bottom wrist comes into play as he powers that down the ground and beats long-off to his right

another full-toss, this one was a little lower, and out comes that bottom-handed whip again. Hits Ishant's right leg in his follow through and the ricochet narrowly misses umpire Richard Kettleborough's head
very full on leg stump and he gets his front leg out of the way to drive to long-on
full and wide, driven to extra cover
length ball on off stump and Marsh creates room to slap that powerfully to sweeper cover
slower ball, ends up short outside leg, and Wade clears his front leg and just helps it over the backward square leg boundary
got him. That's a fullish ball slanting away wide of off stump. Wade looked to thrash his arms through it, having taken a big step back to shorten the length, and only succeeds in top-edging to Dhoni
length ball outside off, comes forward to drive but can't get it past short cover
full on off stump, clipped towards long-on
low full-toss on leg stump, whipped towards long-on
oh, Bumrah, what a delivery. Takes out Faulkner's off stump with a perfect yorker that the batsman plays all around
another one in the blockhole, middle-and-off, not quite a yorker this time, and he clips it away to deep square leg
yorker close to off stump, whipped to long-on. Thinks about the second to get to his hundred, but it isn't available
slower ball outside off, Hastings defends into the off side with soft hands to bring Marsh back on strike
in the blockhole close to off stump, jabbed back hard to the bowler
low full-toss on off stump and Marsh cannot whip it past mid-on, who has been moved into the circle. An excellent finish to a splendid 10 overs on debut

length ball angling into the pads. Doesn't get bat on the flick and it rolls off the outside of the pad to the left of Dhoni. Misfield from Dhoni gave them the chance for a second, but Hastings sends Marsh back
back of a length, angling into middle stump. Dug it in with extra effort and it was past Marsh and over the stumps before he could bring his bat down to pull. Wasn't short enough for that
now he shuffles across to the full ball outside off and clips it away to the right of deep midwicket, picks up three, and reaches a fantastic maiden ODI hundred
slower ball angling down leg, following Marsh who was backing away to make room. Goes down on one knee to give it the big yahoo and misses, and the ball smacks him in the box
and again, another excellent slower ball that follows Marsh's movement away from leg stump. Through that big swipe too quickly and it hits him on the body again
yorker on middle and leg, clipped away towards square leg
nice line to start. Good length around off, Rohit presents the full face of his bat in defence
nicely run from Rohit, got off a little late and suddenly he was in trouble with a direct hit. Slapped into the cover region and goes for the run, makes it in the end
shortish outside off, cut to backward point
good length outside off, chopped down to third man
nice length. Back of a length outside off, clipped to mid-on
worked off his pads but straight to short fine leg
starts on a perfect length. Not very pacey though. Good length on off, cramping Dhawan for room. Defended
135 kph. Length on middle, strikes Dhawan on the thigh pad
aah lovely delivery. 134 kph. Outside off and straightens just a touch to beat the bat of Dhawan who played inside the line
too straight, picked off to square leg
139 ks. Good length outside off, solidly blocked
another one that deviates past the outside edge. Good length outside off, Rohit goes for a drive but is beaten
pierces the gap this time. Fullish outside off, Dhawan forces the ball in the gap through cover for a couple
slightly misjudged run but Hastings had to run around and pick it up with the wrong hand. Dhawan pats the length delivery wide of the bowler and calls for the run. Easy in the end
lovely shot. Short and wide outside off, Rohit smashes the cut but straight to backward point
this one nips back in late. Length outside off, Rohit opens the face to cut to third man
fullish on off, the ball comes back in just enough to take the inside edge to square leg
back of a length outside off, Rohit finds the bowler
another ripper. Full outside off, the ball moves away and beats the flashing drive of Dhawan.
shortish and wide, was there to be it but extracts a bit of bounce which takes the ball over the bat of Dhawan
holds its line now and drifts on to Dhawan who turns this towards midwicket for a couple
big shimmy, expansive shot. Boland bangs it in short outside off, Dhawan fails to connect with his flat-batted stroke
beautiful shot. Mitch Marsh gingerly chases after it to keep it to two. Too straight and Dhawan nicely clips wide of mid-on
shortish outside off, a punchy drive finds cover
lovely shot. Too much width from Hastings and Rohit makes him pay with a lovely square drive past point. Flies to the boundary
back of a length outside off, a punchy drive off the back foot is hit to backward point
fuller and closer to off, driven to mid-on with soft hands
ooh, dangerous. Fullish length on middle, Dhawan backs away, exposes all his stumps but cuts to point
turned away off his hips past midwicket for a couple more
nicely nudged off his hips to deep square leg. Uppish but on many bounces to the fielder
tucking Dhawan up for room, played quietly to mid-on
fullish on middle, worked to midwicket
nice. Easily done. Shimmies down, makes a bit of room for himself and flays the cut past point for a boundary. Terrific batting
top edge and safe. Not a great shot from Dhawan. Good length on middle, Dhawan goes for the pull but gets a thick top edge which flies towards third man.
nice and full outside off, pushed to mid-on
133 kph, good length outside off. Tamely driven to cover
picked up easily off middle stump and over the midwicket boundary for a massive six. Dhawan picks it up with ease. Too full from Hastings. Dhawan looking good again
another outside edge. Back of a length, shaping away. Dhawan is squared up as he tries to play to the leg side. A thick egde flies to third man
fullish on off, slapped into the cover region
135 kph. Overly full on off, drilled to mid-off
cracked away for four more. Comes down and smashes the fuller delivery over cover with a lot of ease.
feigns a back away, and then backs away to expose his stumps. Hastings is least bothered, delivers it full on middle, Cut to point
easily taken off his pads to the midwicket boundary. Too straight and Rohit just times this for four. He doesn't bother running, and then runs. But doesn't matter
and again, poor stuff from Boland. Fullish on off or just outside off, Rohit works it through the midwicket region for another boundary
looked to go there again but this one swerves away just enough to take the outside edge towards backward point
shortish and wide, chopped to cover

goes over the fielder at deep square leg. Marsh was inside the boundary and Dhawan picks it off his pads and lofts it. Fails to keep it down. Marsh backtracks but can't get a hand on it. lands inside and bounces over the boundary
length outside off, defended
length on middle, worked to deep square leg
this is poor bowling. Very full on middle and leg, Dhawan goes after the shot again and picks it off easily. Whistles over the square leg boundary
that is just great to watch. Marsh bowls it full outside off, Dhawan leans into the drive, head over the ball, and just times the off drive to the mid-off boundary. Making it look incredulously easy
slower ball outside off, thrashed to deep cover
too straight but full, driven to mid-on
full on middle, clipped to deep square leg
poor delivery.. Full down leg, worked to deep square leg
better. Length delivery on off, tucked to backward point
carved to point
full on off, blocked
good delivery. Length on middle and off, forcing Rohit to defend
slightly shortish outside off, patted down to third man
nudged off his hips with soft hands to fine leg, looking for two. They won't get it
smashed to deep cover. Too full, too wide
short delivery, decent change in length. Rohit pulls to fine leg
full outside off, a mis-timed drive finds cover
short and wide, creamed to the sweeper
short down leg, pulled to fine leg again
full on off, defended back
tight stuff from Faulkner. Keeping it straight on a good length, played to point
beautiful. What a shot that is. Faulkner errs slightly full and Rohit crunches a delectable cover drive past mid-off to the boundary. That is exquisite
131 kph, clipped to deep square leg
steered to short third man
shortish delivery on off, Dhawan comes down and then chops a cut to point
shortish on off, cut to third man
nice lines. Full on off, Dhawan plays it down to point. He comes down but is sent back in time
massive six. Gets down on one knee, and smashes the slog sweep over the backward square leg boundary. Gets to his fifty as well. This is some batting.
pushed into the covers
easily worked past square leg for two.
better delivery. Tossed up on off, worked down to square leg
fullish outside off, driven to mid-off for a run
back of a length on off, played to point
full on middle, hits Rohit on the pad but pitched outside leg
steered to point

that will e four, I feel. Whipped past midwicket. Bailey runs around from square leg to keep it in, Finch too runs around. A bit of miscommunication. Eventually, Bailey is touching the ball and the rope simultaneously
fullish outside off, driven off the back foot to cover
a hard sweep to backwards square leg
outside off on a fuller length, pushed to cover
clipped to midwicket
lovely chip over midwicket for a run. Nicely played
comes down a bit early, Lyon sees it and fires it a bit wide and short. Dhawan improvises well and cuts to deep point
flat on middle, belted to deep midwicket
full outside off, driven to wide mid-off
shortish on leg, pulled powerfully to deep square leg
worked off the pads to deep square leg
heaved away into the gap at deep midwicket for a brace
fullish length on middle, steered to fine leg
short and wide, Rohit cuts behind point for two. Marsh dives to keep it in. Good shot
floated up on off, Dhawan drives to mid-on powerfully after a run down the track
well bowled, sees Rohit coming down and bowls a bit slower. Rohit checks his shot
swept powerfully to deep square leg, Finch makes an excellent stop
tossed up outside off, the ball turns and grips forcing Rohit to check his shot again to long-off
splendid batting. A tad short outside off, Dhawan pierces the gap behind point for a boundary. More runs
falls safely this time. Tossed up on middle, Dhawan goes for the sweep and gets a thick top edge which goes straight behind the keeper. Three fielders converge but the ball lands right in between
great batting. Australia have no answers at the moment. Dhawan advances, marsh sees it and bowls a bouncer. Dhawan sways out of the line, and ramps the ball off the open face over short third man
chopped behind point for a run
full on off, defended
opens the face to guide the fuller delivery past cover for a couple. Great running this.
short and wide, Rohit goes for the big cut but misses.
back of a length outside off, hit out to mid-off
awful start. Short down leg, Dhawan helps it on its way down to the fine leg boundary.

what a splendid catch that is from Shaun Marsh. A nothing delivery from Hastings, short and wide. Dhawna comes down and belts the cut in the air to deep point. He errs though and fails to keep it down. Shaun marsh runs around and leaps to take the ball over his head, both feet off the ground. And hold son despite landing hard. Is that what Australia need? Dhawan has thrown away a really really good start
back of a length outside off, punched to deep cover
pulled to short mid-on
very short delivery outside off, the ball lobs over Kohli's head. Easy call of wide
nice shot. Back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to extra cover
tickled fine to deep square leg
sublime timing. That has raced to the boundary with ease. Full delivery outside off, Kohli calmly leans into a drive to finds the gap past cover for four. Shaun marsh can't do anything
short and wide, cut past a diving cover for another couple
full on off, Kohli defends
short outside off, cut powerfully to backward point
fuller delivery on off, driven back
nice comeback in the over that. Short and wide, played down to third man
130 kph, full on off, clipped to mid-on

out! Big, big wicket this. Very full and wide from Hastings. Kohli goes for the expansive drive and gets a thin nick through to the keeper. Wade takes it over his head. Australia are a delighted bunch. Huge moment in the game
full outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, left again
another leave. Good length outside off, left alone
goes for the bouncer outside off, Pandey thinks of lofting the ball over third man but withdraws very late
stops on the batsman and almost carries to short cover. Full delivery outside off, Rohit checks his stroke.
132 kph, fuller delivery outside off, Kept down to point
too straight, worked to short fine leg

awesome shot, equally good fielding. Short and wide, Rohit flays a cut past point with such terrific timing that it almost makes it to the very long boundary. Shaun Marsh doesn't give up, runs all the way and keeps it in
clipped to wide mid-on for one
50 for Rohit. Played down to point and Rohit goes through with the iffy run. Makes it in the end
nice short delivery. Bouncer outside off, Rohit sways out of the line
short outside off, cut to point. Warner hits the stumps at the strikers end, rather unnecessary.
a loose waft. Good length outside off, Rohit drives loosely and is beaten
130 kph. Steered down to third man off the open face
thick outside edge, goes down to third man. Nice and full outside off, inviting the drive

dropped. Very hard chance but still a chance. Shortish and wide, coming back in with that angle from wide of the crease. Rohit goes for the cut, but gets a thick edge which flies to Smith at first slip. He leaps but cannot hold on
fullish delivery outside off, Pandey drives it back uppishly but in front of the bowler
whipped off his pads to deep midwicket
whipped to wide mid-on
134 kph. Good length on off, played down defensively
massive six. Shortish delivery on off, Rohit presses forward and looks to smash it, flat-bats it over wide mid-on. Knew that was six from the moment it left the bat
worked to midwicket
shortish delivery on middle, clipped to midwicket
slightly shortish on middle, pulled down to fine leg
flat on off, Rohit gets down early to execute a fine paddle
smashed. In the gap and that will be four. Tossed up on off, Pandey gets down and rockets a sweep to the square leg boundary
slower through the air on middle, worked to deep midwicket
lovely fielding. Tossed up on off, Rohit comes down to drive to cover.
back of a length outside off, steered to third man
back of a length, fourth-stump line. Rohit shuffles across and works it to deep square leg
back of a length, angling into off stump, dabbed to point
drifts onto the pads and Pandey clips it away through midwicket
shortish close to off stump, punched firmly but straight to cover point
length ball angling into off stump, not much of a front-foot stride from Pandey as he looks to push through the mid-off/extra cover region, ends up inside-edging into his pad
down the track to the flighted ball drifting away from off stump, plays the checked drive to long-off
down the track comes Pandey this time and Lyon floats it wide of off stump, giving him plenty of room to flat-bat crisply to the right of short cover
full on middle, clipped to deep midwicket
tossed up on off stump and Rohit's powerful sweep beats square leg diving to his left but Marsh sprints quickly to his right from deep midwicket and makes a diving stop
back of a length on the pads, punched to deep midwicket
full, close to off stump, whipped with the turn to long-on
length ball angling across towards off stump. Pandey uses his wrists to play that to mid-on
full outside off, driven to short cover
full outside off, Rohit can't beat cover point with his square drive
full on middle stump and Rohit makes room to drive inside-out. Makes a good connection but Smith stops it with a dive to his left at mid-off
back of a length outside off, and again he fails to beat cover point. Waited on it and steered with an open face but Finch moved quickly to his left and stopped it
short and wide, and this time Finch dives to his right to stop that back-foot slap
back of a length on off stump, slides on with the angle as Rohit makes room, looking for the punch through cover. Can only push it back to the bowler
this one's a little shorter and he can force it past the diving fielder at extra cover
long-hop on middle stump and Pandey rocks back to pull to the vacant backward square leg boundary
short and wide, slapped to sweeper cover
flighted on middle and off, clipped to long-on
a touch short wide of off, leans back and dabs to short third man
back of a length outside off, steered to the right of third man, far enough from the fielder to complete two. That's also the half-century stand
short, not too much width this time, leans back and chops it to third man
back of a length on off stump and that is smashed. Makes himself a lot of room and just flat-bats it, an inside-out tennis forehand to the left of mid-off
slower ball, full outside off, blocked to mid-off
full, a bit of width, and again a well struck shot goes straight to a fielder, driven to short cover this time, but it's hit hard and the fielder fumbles it to allow the single
back of a length on off stump, comes forward and jabs with a closed bat face to play that through square leg. Interesting-looking shot
another Smith long-hop, and again Pandey is quickly back in his crease, swivels and pulls to the backward square leg boundary
full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
flighted ball outside off, lots of room for Rohit to free his arms and clout that over mid-on, against the turn
full on leg stump and Rohit clips it in the air, chips it deliberately to reach long-on on the bounce, hit it to the right of the fielder
down the track, meets the flighted ball in front of off stump and drives inside-out to sweeper cover
a bit slower now, tossed up wide of off. Rohit has to reach out for it, checks his drive and pushes towards sweeper cover
short and wide, but it's the slower one, and Rohit has to reach out for it. Doesn't quite middle it but slaps it over cover, just out of reach of the leaping fielder
back of a length outside off, another slower one, Rohit is beaten by the angle and lack of pace, trying to dab to third man
length ball on off stump, straightens just a touch, defended into the on side
full outside off, driven to sweeper cover with a slightly open face
full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
loopy slower ball, ends up as a wide full-toss and he reaches out to drive, ends up slicing to backward point
down the track to the flighted ball on middle and leg, chips it in the air, on the bounce to deep midwicket
length ball outside off, dipped a touch on Rohit as he came forward, and he turns his wrists to play that to backward square leg

flighted ball outside off, presses forward and pushes into the ocvers. They go for the single as Mitchell Marsh moves quickly to his left. He picks up and throws, Pandey dives into his crease and makes it home safe. Direct hit would have had him in trouble
down the track comes Pandey and Lyon gives him width once more. Lovely bat-flow through that lofted inside-out drive, and it's over the rope to the left of long-off
back of a length on middle and leg, goes deep in his crease to tuck it towards long leg
quickish length ball on leg stump, gets his front leg out of the way to push down the ground to long-off
full on off stump, driven to long-on
shortish outside off, makes some room to dab it down to third man
length ball outside off, seams away a touch to beat Rohit as he tries to dab it down to third man with an open face
back of a length outside off, lets it come on and steers it to the right of third man to bring up 5000 ODI runs. He's moved to a different level over the last couple of years
length ball outside off, doesn't quite come on to Rohit. Checks his drive and rolls his wrists over at the last moment to keep it down in front of mid-off

full on middle stump and that's dropped by Shaun Marsh. Looked to hit that over mid-off, and maybe the ball stopped on him. Bat turned in his hand and it went high over the off side. Marsh, coming in from sweeper cover, got under it and dropped a sitter. It just popped out of his hand there
short and wide and that's punished. Rohit stands tall and just punches it away to the point boundary
back of a length on off stump, punched to short cover
length ball wide of off and that's such a sweetly timed drive to the left of short cover
excellent bouncer, rising over off stump, and Rohit thinks about hooking before deciding to abort the stroke and duck his head out of the way

back of a length outside off, a bit of extra bounce, and Rohit goes for 99! It hurried through quicker than he expected, perhaps, as he looked to dab it towards third man, and he looks distraught when the caught behind appeal is upheld. Snicko shows the faintest of nicks, though.

gone first ball, is he? Ooh, that looked close. Much fuller this time from Hastings, excellent first ball, angling into the stumps. Dhoni shuffled across his crease instead of moving forward or back, and that ball struck him low on the pad. Not given. Maybe an inside edge, maybe struck just outside the line. Replays show a clear inside edge
fuller now, drifts into the pads, clipped to long leg
back of a length outside off, doesn't come on at all for the slap through point. Dhoni can only poke it back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, steered towards backward point
full on middle stump, clipped towards long leg
shortish outside off, stops on the track again. Dhoni jumps and slaps to short cover
back of a length outside off, dabbed towards third man

full on off stump and Pandey doesn't quite get hold of the lofted drive, bounces down to the right of sweeper cover. Gets two more and that's his half-century. Excellent innings under pressure, so far
short ball outside off and that's a controlled pull, almost just holds his bat up and lets the ball hit it, to place it for another couple, this time through midwicket
back of a length outside off, guided to third man with an open bat face
back of a length wide of off, Dhoni leaves it alone
back of a length close to off stump, punches it to the right of backward point and immediately calls for the single
back of a length on off stump, defended to short cover
down the track and Boland bowls it at his pads, clipped quietly towards deep square leg
length ball outside off, Pandey comes forward for the checked drive through the covers
back of a length, angling into the pads, worked towards midwicket
length ball angling into middle stump, defended to midwicket
length ball outside off, opens his bat face to guide it down to third man
back of a length outside off, dabbed to third man
back of a length close to off stump, punched to short extra cover
full, wide of off. Dhoni frees his arms and drills that hard but backward point dives to his right to stop it
length ball outside off, lets it come on and pokes to backward point
dug in short and wide and Pandey jumps in the air to account for the bounce and uppercuts fiercely, hits it hard and beats third man comfortably to his right
back of a length on off stump, defended towards point
fullish on off stump, Dhoni punches towards mid-off and short cover dives to his right to intercept
down the track and Boland straightens his line. Dhoni has to play around his front pad and misses. Ball hits pad but he's a long way down the pitch. Big appeal but it's not given
Short outside off, doesn't come on to Dhoni's bat or he simply mistimes it, chops down into the ground, in the direction of cover
fullish ball wide of off, driven to sweeper cover
short outside off and Pandey gets on his toes to punch crisply to deep point
back of a length on off stump, defended to short cover
fullish on middle and leg, fairly flat, swept round to deep backward square leg
down the track, doesn't quite get to the pitch of the flighted ball on off stump, clips quietly to midwicket
quicker now, goes on the back foot to defend the middle-stump ball back to the bowler
back of a length on middle and leg, goes back to work to midwicket
back of a length on off stump, punched down the ground to long-off
flat and quick down the leg side. Gets his line wrong and it's called wide as Pandey misses the flick
floated up slower outside off, and it sneaks under Pandey's attempted sweep
short outside off, rises high and Dhoni can't control his pull, hits it in the air and Lyon, settling comfortably under it at deep midwicket, spills another absolute sitter
back of a length on off stump, blocked into the point region
short and wide and Pandey slaps it away, beats backward point and they take two by the time third man runs around to field it
shortish outside off, slapped to backward point
down the track and Boland offers up some width. Pandey isn't quite to the pitch of it, but he frees his arms and flat-bats it so sweetly to the cover boundary
back of a length outside off, opens his bat face and steers it adroitly, nice and fine, to the left of the fielder at third man
goes back to a full ball on middle stump, clips it just wide of midwicket
down the track comes Pandey, loses his shape a bit as he goes for the big hit, but does well to keep it along the ground and hit to long-on
down the track comes Dhoni this time, muscles it powerfully to the right of long-on, and they run quickly to complete two
down the track again, not quite to the pitch this time, squeezes the checked drive out to long-on
flighted ball outside off, whipped with the turn to midwicket
nice flight on off stump, dipped on Pandey a bit. Did well to adjust, keeping his front leg inside the line and opening his bat face to play the checked drive out towards deep point
full-toss on off stump, clubbed down the ground to long-on
full and wide, gets on the front foot to steer it to the right of sweeper cover. They decide, wisely, not to attempt a second as Warner's monster throw comes in
full and wide and Pandey drives to long-off
wide yorker, stabbed away towards backward point
very full, close to off stump. Pandey makes a bit of room by moving his front leg out of the way, and jabs it away to the left of sweeper cover
full outside off, driven to long-off
slower ball on leg stump, clipped through square leg
full-toss on the pads, flicked straight to short fine leg
slower ball wide of off, flat-batted to sweeper cover
in the blockhole and Dhoni misses the flick. Hits him low on the pad, and ricochets into the off side. Huge appeal, but it isn't given. Pitched maybe just outside leg. Marginal

down the track and he can't get to the pitch of this slower ball outside off. Goes through with the shot, doesn't time it, and it's hanging in the air but agonisingly wide of Bailey diving to his right from extra cover

full on leg stump, clipped to midwicket, who's right on the edge of the circle, and they run a single. Smith's throw hits Dhoni's bat as he slides home, and he holds up his hands to reassure everyone that he won't run the overthrow
slower ball wide of off stump. Dhoni has to reach out a long way, elects to leave it, maybe expecting it to be called wide, but it isn't
down the track, Dhoni slogs at this fullish ball outside off, and top-edges it towards third man. The ball bounces just short of Faulkner running in from the rope
slower ball wide of off and Pandey picks it up early and whips it powerfully to the right of long-on. Smith sprints quickly to his right and stops it at the rope with a wholehearted tumble
well bowled. Saw him shaping to move across his crease and bowled a back-of-a-length slower ball outside off. Pandey is beaten trying to guide it down to third man
takes guard on off stump this time and Marsh looks to bowl it even wider, full and wide. This time it's adjudged wide as Pandey reaches out and fails to connect
length ball on middle and leg, cramps Pandey for room. Stabs it back to the bowler

full outside off and Pandey makes a bit of room and doesn't get hold of the big hit over the covers. Skews it in the air, but gets his placement spot on, right in the middle of the triangle formed by extra cover, sweeper cover and long-off
full, down the leg side. Dhoni misses the flick and it deflects off the pad to the diving Wade, who appeals for caught behind. Good early call from Pandey to sneak a leg bye
low full-toss on leg stump, whipped towards long-on. Takes its time getting to the fielder and they use that time to steal a second
down the track to the wide slower ball and he flat-bats firmly to the right of long-off. Two more
makes a bit of room and Faulkner follows with the full-toss. Whips it hard but can't get it past midwicket
lovely slower ball, back of a length. Pandey doesn't pick up the length, is through the pull too quickly and it juuust misses off stump
full on leg stump, clipped firmly but straight to midwicket
fullish, wide of off, flat-batted to long-off
wide yorker and Pandey reaches out and makes vital contact, looks to squeeze it away through point, gets an outside edge that runs away to the third man boundary
slower short ball outside off, wide of Pandey who's moved across his stumps. Chopped down towards backward point
down the track and he  gets too close to this ball from Marsh. Jabs it down towards long-off, and the electric Pandey turns quickly to complete the second, but a direct hit would have done for him
full and wide and this time Dhoni is right where he needs to be. Huge backlift, flat-bats it down the ground, absolutely smashes it and long-off has no chance going to his right
full outside off, slower ball. Dhoni slogs and inside-edges towards short fine leg
full on middle and leg, clips to midwicket, who's slightly deep and allows a reasonably comfortable single
down the track, looks to make room. Faulkner denies him the room with the slower ball and he slogs it out to deep midwicket, on the bounce
full-toss on leg stump, Dhoni lap-sweeps towards long leg
sees him making room and follows him. Slogs at it, misses, and it ricochets off the pad into the off side

down the track and Pandey is an absolute genius at landing the ball short of deep fielders. Takes his bottom hand off the handle while chasing the full, wide slower ball, and it drops short of the sweeper cover fielder running to his right
down the track, Faulkner follows him, and he tucks it away through backward square leg and picks up two, leaving Dhoni at strike at the start of the last over
full and wide, and it's given wide after Dhoni leaves it alone. Harsh call, seemed to be just inside the tramline, though, as Wasim Akram reminds us on TV commentary - the line is just an indication

bam! That's a low full-toss outside off, in Dhoni's slot, but in this innings he hasn't been middling anything. He doesn't middle this either, but he just about clears the leaping long-off fielder. Warner is the fielder. He would have needed to be as tall as Mohammad Irfan to take that
full and wide and Dhoni goes after it and holes out, Warner takes a simple catch running in from long-off. They cross over, however, and Pandey will be on strike

shot. That's full outside off, a wide yorker, almost, and Pandey, cool as a cucumber, brings up his hundred in style. Lets it come on, opens his bat face at impact, and steers it fine to the third man boundary. This has been an outstanding one-day innings
and it's all over. Full outside off and Pandey launches this over the covers. Doesn't really middle it, but all he needs to do is clear the infield, and that's what he does
